repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This palm-leaf manuscript at first seems like an Single Text Manuscript(STM), but contains a few leaves at the end with what it presents as a different text. Although the information has been entered as for an Multiple Text Manuscript(MTM), it is in all likelihood the same text, with the second text possibly being a few stray leaves added to the lot.

msItem.title: Dramiḍopaniṣadttātparyaratnāvalī savyākhyā
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśika & anonymous
msItem.rubric:
śrīmadśrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsasaṃyamīndramahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmadvedāntarāmānujamahādeśikāya namaḥ | śrīmategopāladeśikamahāgu
rave namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ śrīmate bhagavadrāmānujāya namaḥ śriraṃganāyikāsametaśrīraṃganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ | śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ |
msItem.incipit:
vigāhe nigamāntāryadayādivyataraṃgiṇīṃ | saṃsāragarbhasaṃtaptasaṃjīvanavicakṣaṇāṃ | śaṭhārisūktitātparyaratnāvalim imām ahaṃ | vedāntā
cāryavihitāṃ vivṛṇomi satāṃ mude | sākṣānnārāyaṇo devaḥ kṛtvā marttya mayīntanaṃ | maśnānukurute lokān kāruṇyāṃ sya pā
ṇinā eṉṟum manānāṃ bhavināṃ bhavāṇṛvasamuntorāya nārāyaṇaḥ eṉṟum

msItem.title: Dramiḍopaniṣadttātparyaratnāvalī
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśika
msItem.incipit: śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmān+rī vedāntācārya+di - sevāyogyotibhogyaś śubhasubhagata
msItem.explicit:
iti kavitārkikasiṃhasya
śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu dramiḍopaniṣatsāras sampūrṇaḥ

colophon.seg:
kavitārkikasimhāya +ne śrīmate namaḥ
hariḥ om_ śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ

extent.measure: cover folio, guard folio, ff. 1-50, 2 blank folios, ff. 1-54, ff. 1-4, 6 guard folios

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil-letter numerals, left margin up to folio 50, and then 1-54 in the right margin, 1-4 in the left margin

additions.desc: blank folio, v: śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ

origin.origDate: Date not given. Likely late 18th or 19th century

encodingDesc.p: IAST for Sanskrit words and ISO for Tamil words; no abbreviations

revisionDesc.change:
Added XML tags, measured dimensions of the leaves and distance b/w the 2 string holes.
edited by: Gayathri G

U1 seems to be 2 texts/units, ff. 1-50 and ff. 1-54.
edited by: Abhirami Prakasan
